DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe safe consistent technique neck rejuvenation use botulinum toxin . This study also evaluate efficiency intervention determine patient would benefit .
DOC.detailed_description: The abobotulinumtoxinA use Nefertiti lift The abobotulinumtoxinA prepare add 2.5 cc normal saline 500-unit DysportÂ© ( Ipsen Ltd , Berks , UK ) vial Preinjection frontal , oblique lateral patient picture take ( rest contraction ) Injection point : - A series 4 injection point 1-2 cm apart horizontal line mandible posterior hypothetical line nasolabial fold meet mandible - If present , injection platysmal band every 2 cm 2 4 injection point per band ( Injection platysmal band do hold band 2 finger inject intramuscularly ) For injection point 5 unit per point abobotulinumtoxinA use A maximum 125 unit abobotulinumtoxinA allow global neck treatment Follow do 15 day retouch post op picture retouch need . retouch need post injection picture take 10 day post retouch Retouching : residual platysmal band reinjected every 2 cm 2 4 injection point per band ( Injection platysmal band do hold band 2 finger inject intramuscularly ) ( 5 unit per point abobotulinumtoxinA use ) A total 30 patient recruit
DOC.criteria: Female patient present clinic neck rejuvenation : Were deem nonsurgical candidate neck rejuvenation Were willing undergo invasive surgical procedure Had medical contraindication surgery Patients low face botulinum toxin injection past 12 month Patients resorbable low face filler injection past 12 month Patients previous permanent low face filler injection Pregnant patient Lactating patient Patients preexist neuromuscular condition ( myasthenia gravis , Eaton Lambert syndrome ) Patients use medication could potentiate effect botulinum ( ex : aminoglycoside antibiotic ) Patients sensitivity botulinum toxin human albumin
